Thanks so much for these trustworthy, convenient updates of XP Pro SP3.  Several people I know are indebted to your kindness.

QUESTION:  Why haven't you (read: YOU PERSONALLY) uploaded any Windows 7 releases?  There are a few torrents by ul'ers claiming to have gotten them from you, but that breaks the trust chain.  The upload services you use on softarchive are slow, cumbersome with so many dl's, and unreliable.  We can all find Daz loader ourselves to activate, so a clean yet update slipstreamed Windows 7 (64-bit Ultimate, yes please!) from you would be so well received.

Thanks for all you've done and are still doing!

@duriotic
You're welcome.
As for Windows 7, my upload speed is very bad! I can't upload to both file-sharing sites and torrent.
But it's easy, you can download from those guys who claim it's my Windows, then check with the hash to see if it's really mine or not ;)
You can find the hashes for Windows 7 at my forums.
Good luck.
